content: This current republican constituency is nothing short of pure and utter anti american values and beliefs. They are truly one of the lowest classes of people who currently have the right to breathe. We have fought wars to keep people like this from taking control of the world. But I guess too many people have either forgotten or just dont care. Refusing to be held accountable to your constituents, the ones who elected you in the first place, should warrant means for the recalling of said official. It is the duty and obligation of all politicians to interact with the peole. It is one of the cornerstones of American democracy.
